remarks: Colinear functionals have equal kernels.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Mar-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lcdlkreq.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdlkreq.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdlkreq.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
lcdlkreq.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdlkreq.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` C ) $.
lcdlkreq.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` C ) $.
lcdlkreq.v $e |- V = ( Base ` C ) $.
lcdlkreq.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcdlkreq.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
lcdlkreq.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( N ` { I } ) ) $.
lcdlkreq.z $e |- ( ph -> G =/= .0. ) $.
lcdlkreqN $p |- ( ph -> ( L ` G ) = ( L ` I ) ) $.
